General.Name: CJ ENM CO. Ltd
General.Description: CJ ENM CO., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in media content, film, music, convention, performing arts, and animation businesses. The company offers content to broadcast channels in various genres; and marketing solutions. It also engages in the planning, investment, and distribution of domestic films; investment, production, and distribution of music; planning and producing programs and conventions; planning, investment, production, distribution, and licensing of animation. CJ ENM CO., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
